ERROR_FILL_ALL_FIELDS: Please fill in all required fields correctly.
ERROR_EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.
ERROR_PASSWORD_MINLENGTH: Password must be at least 6 characters.
ERROR_EMAIL_IN_USE: This email address is already in use. Please try logging in or use a different email.
ERROR_INVALID_EMAIL: The email address is not valid.
ERROR_WEAK_PASSWORD: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials.
ERROR_UNEXPECTED: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
ERROR_GOOGLE_SIGNIN_FAILED: Failed to sign in with Google. Please try again.
ERROR_SAVING_USER_DATA: Error saving user data after Google sign-in.
EXPENSE_NO_CATEGORY_HINT: No categories available. Please add some on the Category page.
EXPENSE_NO_EXPENSES_HINT: No expenses recorded yet. Add one above!
EXPENSE_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this expense? This cannot be undone.
EXPENSE_ERROR_ADD: An error occurred while adding the expense.
EXPENSE_ERROR_UPDATE: An error occurred while updating the expense.
EXPENSE_ERROR_DELETE: An error occurred while deleting the expense.
EXPENSE_ERROR_EDIT_FORM_INVALID: Please correct the invalid fields in the expense you are editing.
EXPENSE_ERROR_NO_EXPENSE_SELECTED: No expense selected for editing or form is invalid.
EXPENSE_PRICE_NON_NEGATIVE: Price must be a non-negative number.
NO_TOTALS_FOR_DATE: No totals found for the selected date.
NO_CATEGORY_TOTALS_FOR_DATE: No category totals found for the selected date.
NO_TOTALS_FOR_DATE_RANGE: No totals found for the selected date range.
NO_CATEGORY_TOTALS_FOR_DATE_RANGE: No category totals found for the selected date range.
NO_CATEGORIES_FOUND: No categories found. Add one above!
CONFIRM_DELETE_CATEGORY: Are you sure you want to delete this category? This cannot be undone.
DATA_SAVE_ERROR: An error occurred while saving data.
DATA_DELETE_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting data.
NO_DATA_FOR_YEAR: No data available for this year.
NO_DATA_FOR_HALF_YEAR: No data available for this half-year.
NO_DATA_FOR_MONTH: No data available for this month.
NO_INCOMES_FOR_YEAR: No incomes recorded for this year.
